tool.name: Chimeric Junction Parser
tool.description: From the STAR aligner chimeric junction output, find additional junctions of interest, as defined in the input BEDPE.

param.name: srch_junc
param.label: BEDPE Regions
param.help: Input BEDPE file describing regions of interest.

tool.help:
usage: chim_junc_parse.py [-h] [--version] raw_junc srch_junc bedpe_out
positional arguments: raw_junc Input chimeric junctions from STAR. srch_junc Input BEDPE file describing regions of interest. bedpe_out Output containing sites of interest.
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit --version show program's version number and exit
